Dialogue.Page: Hatchling, you're awake! I'm a bit surprised you found me all the way out here.
Anything I can do for you?

DialogueOption.Text: Do you know anything about a warning message?
I'm going to take a look around.

Dialogue.Page: I know! Pretty crazy planet, isn't it? I personally prefer somewhere with a better view of the night sky.
Although, it's not every day that I get to <color=orange>study a star this closely</color>.
Look around if you don't know what I'm talking about.
A warning message? You could say that. I received a garbled message that seemed to be coming from <color=orange>inside of Ash Twin</color>.
A lot of the transmission was lost, but I heard one thing in particular:
"Our sun is about to go supernova!"
Chilling, I know. Whoever sent that message must be able to see into the future, because after I ran the tests I discovered that the warning was true.
I just hope the same doesn't happen here.
